cause.description:
many businesses anr ropo such as mcdonalds is getting tried of all the skaters around there. 1 thing they dont relieze is that most of their business is from all the skaters.
1. Ropo is my home
2. most other skateparks are like an hour ride when skating from our houses
3. the businesses next to ropo would have to deal with more skaters on there property
cause.mission: keep ropo from getting shut down by local bussineses and the city of Rolandpark
cause.name: Mission to KEEP ROPO
